translation: Arjuna said, "What is Brahman? What is Adhyatma? What is action, O best among men? What is Adhibhuta declared to be? And, what is Adhidaiva said to be?"
commentary: 8.1 What what? That that? Brahma Brahman? What what? Adhyatmam Adhytama? What what? Karma action? Purushottam O best among men? Adhibhuta Adhibhuta? f and? What what? proktam declared? Adhidaivam Adhidaiva? What what? Ucyate is called.Commentary In the last two verses of the seventh chapter Lord Krishna had used certain philosophical and technical terms such as Adhyatma? Adhibhuta? Adhidaiva and Adhiyajna.
